MMI stands for Modular Microscope Instrument. It is designed by DEMO TU Delft for use with TEM / SEM microscopy

The mmis package contains all software required to use the hardware modules that are available for the system. 


--- Releases ---
version 1.0:
Software for the Sample Heater and Dual Heater modules is included. Also the real time clock is controlled from this package

1.01: README.md included in the package

Version 1.21:
Software for the Liquid Nitrogen Level Control Test mode is included

Version 1.22:
Software for the Sample heater is upgraded with extra control option called Profile Control

Version 1.23:
Software for the Sample heater is upgraded with extra control option called Ramp Control

Version 1.24:
Added the software version number to header of the software GUI
